result.repo_summary_line: A comprehensive microservices ecosystem for the Ronin Wallet, providing quest management, reward distribution, device management, and discovery services for the Ronin ecosystem.

monorepo_services.name: antenna
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for the initialization, configuration, and routing of the Antenna application.

monorepo_services.name: cms
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for the configuration, initialization, and dependency injection of the CMS application.

monorepo_services.name: consumer
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for the consumer service in a wallet application, handling configuration, initialization, and dependency injection.

monorepo_services.name: cron_job
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing and executing scheduled tasks within the application using cron jobs.

monorepo_services.name: device_manager
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing device-related operations and services within the application.

monorepo_services.name: discovery
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for the configuration, initialization, and dependency injection of the discovery service in the application.

monorepo_services.name: doc
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for generating and defining Swagger documentation for the API used in the Quest feature of Ronin Wallet.

monorepo_services.name: proxy
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing the proxy service in the Ronin wallet application.

monorepo_services.name: push_notification
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing push notifications in a wallet application.

monorepo_services.name: quest_center
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for the configuration, routing, and dependency injection of the quest center application in the Ronin wallet services.

monorepo_services.name: task_scheduler
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for initializing and managing a task scheduling application.

monorepo_services.name: task_server
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for the task server application.
